title: SatsGoal
author: SatsGoal
created_time: August 26, 2022, 01:49:44 PMLast edit: August 26, 2022, 11:50:21 PM by SatsGoal
content: Hello fellow bitcoiners! I've launched a free web app to motivate bitcoiners to stack those sats and reach their next satoshi goal!Best viewed on desktop, the site is now live at www.satsgoal.comInput a recurring buy amount and stacking length, choose your stacking frequency and estimate the future price (annual growth rate or values on specific dates) to calculate how many sats you could accumulate.Alternatively the SatsGoal toggle enables you to enter how many sats you need to accumulate to hit your next goal, and the tool will output how much you need to regularly save in Bitcoin to reach your SatsGoal.The tool generates two graphs and a table illustrating your stack size and future fiat value rising so you can fully visualise your stacking journey.Try it out and let me know what you think!
